content:
TITLE: Starting the DocPad server for Semantic UI docs
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the DocPad server, which will generate and serve the Semantic UI documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Semantic-Org/Semantic-UI-Docs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-09_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docpad run
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing DocPad and dependencies for Semantic UI docs
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install DocPad globally and install project dependencies. DocPad is the static site generator used to create the HTML for the Semantic UI documentation site.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Semantic-Org/Semantic-UI-Docs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-09_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install -g docpad@6.79.4
docpad install;
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Publishing Semantic UI docs to GitHub Pages
DESCRIPTION: Command to automatically publish the Semantic UI documentation to GitHub Pages. This deploys the static version of the site.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Semantic-Org/Semantic-UI-Docs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-09_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docpad deploy-ghpages --env static
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Node.js version 8 using NVM
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install and use Node.js version 8 using NVM (Node Version Manager). This is recommended for compatibility with the DocPad version used in Semantic UI docs.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Semantic-Org/Semantic-UI-Docs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-09_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nvm install 8
nvm use 8
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining User-Agent Access in robots.txt
DESCRIPTION: This snippet configures the robots.txt file to allow unrestricted access to all user agents (web crawlers). It uses the wildcard '*' to indicate that the rule applies to all crawlers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Semantic-Org/Semantic-UI-Docs/blob/master/server/raw/robots.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
User-agent: *
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Humans.txt Content for Semantic-UI-Docs
DESCRIPTION: This snippet outlines the content of the humans.txt file, including team information, acknowledgments, and the technology stack used in the Semantic-UI-Docs project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Semantic-Org/Semantic-UI-Docs/blob/master/server/raw/humans.txt#2025-04-09_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
# humanstxt.org/
# The humans responsible & technology colophon

# TEAM

    jack Lukic - Developer

# THANKS

   Quirky Inc

# TECHNOLOGY COLOPHON

    HTML5, CSS3
    jQuery
```
